overview.description: JCL IBM provides precise control and specification of job steps and datasets using DD statements, facilitating accurate job execution and resource management.

step_list.property: JCL IBM allows precise control and specification of job steps and datasets, such as defining input files using DD statements, as shown in the COB1 step with dataset `FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.CBL(CSUTLDTC)`.
